page.title: 01PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: {PRINCIPAL FEATURES THE QUARY IS A ILLSTRATING THE HALDON GRAVELS OVER 65 MILLION YEARS OLD.THE LAST LARGE FIRE WAS AT LITTLE HALDON.IT COVERED A FEW ACRES.IT IS NOT YET KNOWN HOW MANY ACRES THE GREAT FIRE COVERED. THE MOST UANDALIZED THING IN HALDON IS THE ADVETURE TRAIL.THE SCOTCH PINE TIMBER IS USED FOR POSTS,HUTSAND BULDINGS.THERE IS A WOODEN CABIN THAT WAS BULIT IN 1978 AND TOOK THREE WEEKS TO BUILD.THERE IS A STONE FLOOR WHICH WAS MADE BY ROCKS FROM THE QUARY.{HALDON TOWER THE TOWER IS A VERY CLEAR LAND MARK.IT STANDS OUT VERY WELL.TWO PEOPLE LIVE IN IT ARE THE DALE BROTHERS.IT IS A VERY GOOD PLACE FOR A PICNIC ON A HOT DAY,BUT IT SEEMS TO BE OPEN WHEN IT RAINS{OR}ITS MISTY.YOU CAN SEE IT WHEN YOU ARE LOST.
